recentFeatures.name: discord-message-assistant
recentFeatures.note: Multi-domain Discord bot with Claude API: 3 domains (Nutrition, News, API Usage), 3 scheduled jobs (Morning Briefing, Balance Monitor, School Run), Garmin/Withings/Twilio/xAI integrations

functional: Domain registry routes by channel ID
Scheduler runs cron tasks within tolerance
Tool fetches data from external API
Scheduled job posts to correct channel
error: API failure returns partial data with error field
Token refresh triggers on expired response
Unknown tool returns error in tool_result
External API failure shows fallback message
